hero.title: TASKANA
hero.subtitle: The leading open-source enterprise solution
solution.headline: Learn more about our solution
solution.description: TASKANA is a lightweight open source solution to implement centralized task control for large and medium sized organizations. With the help of TASKANA, tasks from different sources/systems can be bundled and prioritized and managed in one place
solution.description-2: The technical implementation meets the highest requirements for performance, stability and availability. TASKANA is already used by some of the largest insurance companies in Germany in service units with significantly more than 1000 users
solution.description1: The central aspect of TASKANA is the management of the task inventory - this is done via Workbaskets, which also called task lists. A distinction is made between personal, team and topic Workbaskets. The configurable Workbaskets can be used to flexibly map the process organization of your company. Authorizations ensure that each employee only sees the relevant and permitted section of the entire task set
solution.description2: TASKANA offers various routing and distribution functions to assign incoming tasks to the correct Workbaskets, or to redistribute them between Workbaskets
solution.description3: The dynamic prioritization functions in TASKANA allow you to control the processing sequence of tasks at any time. This ensures that the most important tasks are always addressed first
solution.description4: To keep track of a large worklist, TASKANA offers various overviews that allow real-time monitoring. From these views, tasks can in turn be redistributed and assigned as needed
technology.headline: Technology
technology.description: Our open-source solution was realized by using the latest technologies and lean development with as few dependecies as possible. Thanks to Angular, Spring and Camunda, we are not only able to provide a stand-alone task management component, which also allowed to be integrated into larger use cases
technology.features: The open source product is divided into the following three components:
technology.feature1: A central Java API with persistent data storage (TASKANA Core) plus an optional REST API
technology.feature2: Three user interfaces (for administrators, for users and for management) that communicate with the core communicate via the REST interface (TASKANA Web)
technology.feature3: An adapter for connecting third-party systems (TASKANA adapter). This offers a flexible connector concept and already provides a ready-to-use implementation for Camunda BPM
workwithus.headline: Work With Us
workwithus.description: TASKANA as software is open source and therefore freely accessible and usable. We are happy to support your project to ensure that your own critical applications based on TASKANA will continue to function reliably in the future
workwithus.feature1: Tailored task management - feels like custom development, but is 70-80% standard
workwithus.feature2: Cost-effective solution - as there are no license costs, The maintenance effort is distributed among all participating partners
workwithus.feature3: Possibility of influencing the functional further development of the "standard"
workwithus.feature4: Reduced project time compared to custom development, as you get large parts of the software delivered ready to use
workwithus.feature5: Integration, testing and deployment can be carried out using your established software development processes
workwithus.feature6: Modular structure - you only use the parts of TASKANA that have value for you
contact.headline: Contact Us
contact.description1: Are you curious to find out to what extent the open source tool TASKANA can also be used in your company and what benefits TASKANA has for you in the area of task management? Then ask for an individual web session, which we would be happy to offer you free of charge. Write us a mail at
contact.description2: or reach out to our expert directly!
